name: Polygon Swap
description:
Polygon Swap by Whisker Games

Submission for the GeoJam 2021

Control two polygons: a triangle and a square, in this fun puzzle game! Switch their places to avoid hazards! Some obstacles can be passed by a certain polygon, and some will stop them both. You'll have to figure out your way to the end of each level! Beat all 8 levels to win!

WARNING: This game contains glowing and flashing bright colors that may cause discomfort and/or seizures for those with photosensitive epilepsy. Please be careful if your health is put at risk. You can turn off glow and lower the brightness from the settings, I hope it helps.

Credits

Music:

Jellyfish in Space by Kevin MacLeod
